requestBody.description:
## Warning

Request body must be encrypted.

The request body data would be encrypted as "AES-128(256) / CBC mode / PKCS#5 Padding / Base64 Encoding", through the [EncryptedBody](https://github.com/samchon/@nestia/core#encryptedbody) component.

Therefore, just utilize this swagger editor only for referencing. If you need to call the real API, using [SDK](https://github.com/samchon/nestia#software-development-kit) would be much better.

----------------

Information of yours

201.description:
## Warning

Response data have been encrypted.

The response body data would be encrypted as "AES-128(256) / CBC mode / PKCS#5 Padding / Base64 Encoding", through the [EncryptedRoute.Post](https://github.com/samchon/@nestia/core#encryptedroute) component.

Therefore, just utilize this swagger editor only for referencing. If you need to call the real API, using [SDK](https://github.com/samchon/nestia#software-development-kit) would be much better.

----------------

Information of newly joined seller

get.summary: - When namespaced DTO type comes, `@nestia/sdk` had taken a mistake that writing only the deepest type even in the top or middle level namespaced types
get.description:
- When namespaced DTO type comes, `@nestia/sdk` had taken a mistake that writing only the deepest type even in the top or middle level namespaced types.
- When `clone` mode being used in SDK generator, it was not possible to clone recursive DTO type.

get.summary: - When namespaced DTO type comes, `@nestia/sdk` had taken a mistake that writing only the deepest type even in the top or middle level namespaced types
get.description:
- When namespaced DTO type comes, `@nestia/sdk` had taken a mistake that writing only the deepest type even in the top or middle level namespaced types.
- When propagation mode being used with `@TypedException<T>()` decorator, target `T` type had not been cloned.
- When `clone` mode being used in SDK generator, it was not possible to clone recursive DTO type.
- check optional query DTO
- when use HttpCode decorator, sdk build fail code

PartialPickIUsernameemailoptional_attrnu.description: Make all properties in T optional
